title: The 70 most important interpretations of seeing Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: The clearest connotations of seeing Surah Al-Waqi’a in a dream: We see many surahs of the Holy Qur’an in a dream, each of which has its own meaning separate from the others, and according to the dreamer’s condition and the place where he read the Qur’an, the interpretation will be more accurate, and because we are on an Egyptian website we provide the most accurate indications of the symbols appearing in the dream, in In this article, we will present the interpretation of Surah Al-Waqi’ah in detail. Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream The interpretation of a dream from Surat Al-Waqi’ah indicates obedience to God and His love, and the jurists said that the dreamer who sees Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream wrote it or read it in a beautiful voice, so the dream indicates that the dreamer is an ascetic in this world, and does many things. Among the behaviors that earn him a place in Paradise are as follows: Or not: They could be those who work to hide people, meet their needs, and get them out of serious crises. Second: As we mentioned in the first lines, Surat Al-Waqi’ah refers to piety and obedience, so the dream reveals the dreamer’s prayer and his commitment to it in a way Disciplined, and he can perform other types of obedience, such as: continuous fasting and paying zakat and zakat, taking into account the religious conditions for each of them. Third: Surah Al-Waqi’ah, if it appears in a dream, then the meaning of the sight is promising and indicates that the dreamer will not enter Hell later and will not cry in this world, but God will give him Divine protection and many rewards. He will enjoy because of his good deeds. A husband who complains about life and its many demands, if he sees someone from his family such as his mother, father, or wife reciting Surat Al-Waqi’ah in his head, God will give him easy nourishment without hardship or suffering. When the dreamer dreams that he and his family read Surat Al-Waqi’ah, The dream indicates that they will be among the people of Paradise and success will accompany them throughout their lives. Some jurists said that reading Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream indicates the connection and return of some social relationships in the dreamer’s life again. Whoever quarrels with his friend or one of his relatives and the relationship between them is broken, then this dream is almost peace. Whoever truly fears someone, and that person appears carrying the Book of God and reciting Surat Al-Haqiyyah, then the feelings of fear are not in their right place; Because this person is good and righteous in his intention and heart, and therefore there is no harm in marrying him. To clarify the previous interpretation, we will present a simple example: If a virgin proposes to marry a young man and she fears him and sees him reciting this surah in a vision, then this is positive. A sign that he is a young man with good character and will bring her all kinds of happiness and then her marriage to him will be stable and peaceful. Whoever is imprisoned and recites Surah Al-Waqi’ah in his dream, God will surprise him with clear changes in his life, such as releasing him from prison and giving him a lot of livelihood, freedom and stability in life. And whoever is barren Or he is sick and this illness delays his childbearing, so if he sees this auspicious Surah in a dream, then God will grant him the blessing of the righteous. Some jurists said that reading Surah Al-Haqiyya in a dream could be a clear message of the necessity of reading it in reality so that God will relieve his distress and relieve him of distress and pain. If A person dreams that the verses of Surat Al-Waqi’ah are written

Some jurists said that reading Surah Al-Haqiyya in a dream could be a clear message of the necessity of reading it in reality so that God will relieve his distress and relieve him of distress and pain. If A person dreams that the verses of Surat Al-Waqi’ah are written

title: The most famous and wonderful interpretations of seeing a dam in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dam in a dream carries many things and indicators for the dreamer, and its interpretation differs based on the fortuneteller himself, the context of the vision and its events that the dreamer sees in his dream, and therefore it either brings goodness. For him or a bad interpretation for the fortuneteller, so we learn together about all of these interpretations through our distinguished Egyptian website. Interpretation of a dream about a dam in a dream. Since the dam is a tall and strong building, it was built with the aim of protecting from the dangers of floods. Seeing it in a dream also indicates protection, safety, and fortress for the dreamer from dangers and problems. And crises. The dam also indicates the strength, power, and influence of the visionary, especially if he is male. Some imams and commentators said that seeing a dam in a dream indicates a king or ruler. Some said that dreaming of a dam in a dream indicates the extent of the dreamer’s piety, righteousness, and commitment to his relationship with God, Lord. Worlds. It also indicates the great culture and high awareness of the visions. In some other interpretations, we find that seeing a dam in a dream indicates a lot of money and a lot of livelihood that the dreamer will earn. The larger the barrier is in the dream, the more this is a strong indication of great security and immunity. The high position that the dreamer will gain. But if one sees in a dream a lot of water behind a dam, this indicates a great deal of sustenance and a great favor that the dreamer will obtain during this year. Also, seeing a water dam in a dream indicates the great status that the dreamer will acquire, and his high status. And his good morals. It also indicates his great closeness to the Lord of the Worlds by avoiding immorality and everything that makes God angry at him. Also, seeing the building of a dam in a dream indicates the dreamer’s kindness and strength, and he is likely to get a promotion in his job, or indicates the nearness of marriage if the fortuneteller is not married. But if a divorced woman sees a dam in her dream, this means that she will gain protection and strength after weakness and defeat. If the dam is filled with water in a divorced or widowed woman’s dream, this means that she will gain comfort, stability, and abundant goodness in her next life. But if a divorced woman sees the dam empty in Her dream indicates her poverty, extreme need, and instability on the physical or emotional level. As for seeing a dam exploding in a dream, it is an undesirable dream and indicates the many problems and fears that the dreamer is exposed to in his life. It also indicates a lack of means of livelihood. The Egyptian website is The largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. A dam in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dam in a married woman’s dream carries many interpretations, such as: If a married woman sees that she saw a dam in her dream, This indicates the protection, strength, and security that this woman enjoys in her life. If a married woman is sick or afflicted with evil, and she sees a barrier in her sleep, then this is good news for her to recover from the disease, complete her recovery, and keep evil away from her. But if the dam is filled in a married woman’s dream,

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing a married woman: A married woman worries about her married life and her children when she has a bad dream or sees a strange insect in her dream. That is why many women ask about the interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and the death of a married woman and the various indicators that this vision indicates through the site.Various.Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married woman. Many dream interpreters agree that if a married woman dreams of being bitten by lice, then this It means that this woman will be affected by some enemies who do not want this woman to live a happy life. If a married woman dreams of lice on her clothes, this indicates that the wife will fall into a financial crisis in her future life. As for seeing lice in the spouses’ bed, this indicates a separation The husband from his wife, which may lead to divorce. If a woman is infected with lice and does not kill it, then that woman is committing an immoral act. But if a married woman dreams of lice, this is good. If this woman gets rid of lice and kills it, she will get rid of the problems and crises that hinder her progress. Read Also: Interpretation of a dream about killing with a knife in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair and killing. Here are dream interpreters. Killing lice in a dream indicates that the lady will not fall into misfortune and evil planned. Killing lice also indicates staying away from bad friends in the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin said. Killing lice in a dream means getting rid of the trouble and pain that its owner is suffering from in the dream. If the girl is engaged to a young man with a bad character, then the dream of killing lice indicates her behavior towards this young man and the end of her engagement or relationship with him. If the married woman faces a certain problem in her life It makes her argue with her husband, as this indicates that this woman is completely free of those problems. Also, killing lice in a dream usually indicates a serious illness that the dreamer suffers from, and recovers from. Interpretation of a dream about lice for a girl: If a girl sees a lice in her hair, then the louse is her partner and this The vision warns her against consummating the relationship with him. As for finding a lot of lice in the girl’s hair, it seems that there are many enemies in the girl’s life who are trying to harm her. If the lice in the hair are white and do not bite this girl, this indicates that there are many Hatred and jealous friends are in her life, but she will not really hurt these friends. If this girl is sick and sees a lot of lice, this indicates that the disease is serious and there is no cure for it. A girl’s dreams of lice may indicate that the girl will face some financial problems, which may cause her to fall ill. The girl is in debt problems. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a single woman. Lice in a dream could be evidence of marriage to a man with a bad personality and rude behavior, and the girl will not be happy marrying her. Ibn Sirin believes that discovering lice in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that young people They will give her bad speeches, which will cause a lot of problems for her

title: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi for good and evil

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in different cases, from the point of view of dream interpretation scholars, and we will present on the Encyclopedia website in detail the interpretation of this dream from all angles and from various points. All of these interpretations are nothing but the jurisprudence of scholars, and the whole matter is in the hands of God alone, and He is He who says to the thing “Be,” and it exists, and therefore you should not let yourself worry and worry. He is afraid that they will control you and think logically and calmly before making any decision. As in this article, you will find a link to an application that you can download. This application will help you interpret your dreams in an easy and quick way while keeping the data that you have complete confidence. Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a dream If one is imprisoned in prison and satisfied, it means that this person will have a long life. This person will get out of prison and escape from many evils in his life. But if one sees in his dream that he has been released from a narrow prison to a spacious place, it means that he will feel comfortable and comfortable. With a lot of money and a lot of good behind them, but he sees in a dream that he trusts him in his house, this indicates that he will be freed from sadness and worry. But if a woman sees in her dream that she is imprisoned in a house with a man, this means that she will marry a wealthy and high-ranking man. If that woman is married, this means that she will receive great livelihood and abundance. Money. But if a person sees in a dream that he is detained somewhere, but he cannot get out of it, this means that this person will get a lot of money and become good. But if a person dreams that he is escaping from prison, this indicates his salvation from oppression and destruction. This indicates that he turned away from disobeying God Almighty, but Satan came back to attack him again, and he returned to what they hated. Interpretation of sadness in a dream Ibn Sirin believes that there is no need to worry if the dreamer sees that he is going to prison, because harsh conditions in a dream are often a good sign And the beginning of being discovered in real life. Getting out of prison can indicate a change in social circumstances that will happen to the dreamer, such as changing jobs, returning from a trip, etc. If one moves away from his family and misses his loved ones and sees in a dream that he has been released from prison This means that he will soon return to his home again, God willing. If a person suddenly enters prison and becomes afraid in a dream, this means that he is not ready for the changes that will occur in his life in the coming period. If the dreamer enters prison of his own free will and no one forced him to do so, and he is happy And smiling in a dream, it means that he chose prison to save him from immorality or bad sins that he may have fallen into. This indicates his good condition and purity in himself. Our Master Joseph entered prison to escape the conspiracy of his beloved wife, so entering prison in a dream greatly indicates purity and distance from sins and immorality. Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi If the dreamer comes out of prison in a dream, this means that he will get rid of Things that disturb his life, such as some of his bad qualities, for example

title: Interpretation of dreams: Someone tells me that I will die in a dream

preview.html: The dream interpretation of someone telling me that I will die in a dream is one of the most strange dreams that one can see and search for its meanings and interpretations, so let’s get to know all of these important interpretations and signals. Which talks about this vision in detail.Interpretation of a dream about someone telling me that I will die in a dreamWhoever dreams that someone tells him that he will die, this is a sign of the dreamer’s long life.A human dream tells me that I will die as a sign of good circumstances and closeness to Almighty God.Seeing someone tells me that I am going to die is a sign of your health at that time. Seeing someone telling me that I am dying indicates the successes that the person with the vision will achieve in his life in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream to see a person saying that he is going to die in a dreamIf a person with insight sees someone saying that he is going to die, This is a sign of great fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period. Seeing someone saying that he will die in a dream is a sign of longevity and good luck. When one sees that someone is saying that he will die, this is a sign of good circumstances and continued success in his life in the coming period. Dreaming about someone saying that he will die is a sign of a new stage that the dreamer will enter during this period. Interpretation of a dream about my father who says that he will die in a dream. If someone sees that his father told him that he has died, this is a sign of positive changes that will occur in the life of the dreamer during the coming period. The dream of a father telling his son that he died in a dream is a sign of the new stage that the dreamer will enter in the coming period. Whoever sees in his dream that his father tells him that he will die is an indication of the good that the dreamer will do during that period. Seeing a father telling his son that he died, It indicates important changes in his life during this time. I dreamed that a dead person was telling me that I was going to die in a dream. If someone sees that there is a dead person, telling him that he is going to die as a sign of his great longing for him and his great love for him. Seeing the dead person telling the dreamer that he is going to die is a sign On the dreamer's great closeness to the Blessed and Most High God during this period. A dream of the living dead who will die is brought out as a sign of a great sin committed by the dreamer, because he will stop doing it for a while. Interpretation of dreams I will die soon in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees that she will die soon, this is evidence of her closeness to God Almighty at that time. Dreaming about a sick girl who will die soon is a sign of recovery from these diseases and relief of pain during the coming period. Seeing that he will die soon is a sign that he will find a new job with a very high salary. The dream in which I will die soon is in a dream about a pot girl. It is an indication of the changes that are occurring in her life during the coming period. Interpretation of a dream of a woman telling me that I will die in a dream. Seeing a woman telling me that I will die is a sign of correct insight in the coming period. Dreaming of a woman telling me that I will die is a sign that I will move to a new stage in the coming period. When I see a woman talking to me and telling me that I am dying, this is a sign

Rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Rain in a dream. Seeing rain indicates an abundance of goodness and announces to the dreamer that he will soon achieve many achievements in his professional life, as he has gone through a long period of stress and anxiety. To appear strong and bold in front of others. Rain in a dream for a married woman. The abdomen in humans is the part that is located between the chest and the pelvis, and this area is called the abdominal cavity, and in terms of appearance, the shape of the abdomen differs from one person to another. His body or from the body of another man, and today We will present the most important interpretations that resulted from seeing the stomach in a dream by the great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing the stomach in a dream indicates things such as graves, prisons, and narrow places. A swollen stomach in a dream indicates wealth and a good position that the dreamer will attain in society. Whoever sees in a dream that he is returning to his mother’s womb, it is an indication of the return of the expatriate from travel. Seeing a fire emerging from the stomach is an indication of the dreamer consuming prohibited money, or violating the rights of others, and he will repent for it. Seeing the stomach cleaned in a dream announces poverty and a waste of money. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing pressure in the abdomen in a dream. A deviated stomach in a dream indicates the loss of money or the loss of a close person. If a person loses his stomach in a A dream indicates the death of one of his friends, relatives, or guardians. title: Interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about spoiled wheat in a dream We may find that some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about spoiled wheat in a dream, and there are a large number of indications and interpretations of dreams. Scientists. Interpretation of a dream about spoiled wheat in a dream Spoiled wheat in a dream can indicate some problems that the dreamer may face during this time, thanks to God. If a person sees himself eating contaminated wheat in a dream, it may indicate things that are not good and trivial, and the dreamer does not benefit from them, and he must prevent them. If you see spoiled wheat in a dream, this may indicate a bad psychological life or tension that the dreamer feels at that time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing spoiled wheat in a dream indicates that the dreamer is preoccupied with very trivial matters in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting ears of corn in a dream and picking ears of corn in a dream may indicate the good that the dreamer may receive in his life during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is collecting ears of corn in a dream, this may indicate his success in studying or working during those days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing the harvest of corn in a dream indicates the ability to achieve the desires and dreams that its owner wanted to achieve during this period. Seeing the harvest of ears of corn in a dream may indicate the happiness that may befall the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking in Wheat fields in a dreamWalking in wheat fields in a dream may indicate a wide life that the dreamer will obtain in his life in those days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing one walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates good events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates an increase in the knowledge that the dreamer enjoys during this period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing walking on wheat in a dream indicates a profitable trade that the dreamer may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from someone in a dream Taking wheat from a person in a dream may indicate the good character that the dreamer enjoys at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing receiving wheat from a man in a dream indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer can obtain and the enormous livelihood, thanks to God. If a person sees wheat from a person in a dream, this may indicate his care and not spending it on things that are not useful in those days, and God knows best. Seeing taking wheat from someone in a dream can indicate that he is a good person and that he is a person of good character, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from the dead in a dream Taking wheat from the dead in a dream may It refers to the gifts that may come into the dreamer's life during this time, thanks to God. Receiving wheat from the dead in a dream may indicate the happiness that the dreamer enjoys in his life during this time. In the event that the person sees that the dead was eating wheat, this may indicate the good changes and happiness that the dreamer enjoys.

title: More than 12 months of interpretation of a dream about sheep by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a sheep by Ibn Sirin: Seeing slaughtering a sheep in a dream is evidence of obtaining goodness and livelihood. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream may indicate performing Hajj or Umrah. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream indicates the return of an expatriate traveler to his family. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream often indicates To travel and the desire to obtain a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep for a man: Seeing a small sheep in a dream is a sign of the good upbringing enjoyed by the dreamer. Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. A sheep in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person of faith and piety. Slaughtering sheep inside a dream says a lot of good. If you see a man buying a sheep in a dream, it means that his wife will get pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream about one sheep. For a girl to see a small white sheep in a dream is a sign that the groom will come to her soon. A small sheep may indicate the husband’s marriage The weak of a girl. A black sheep in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a love story, but it will be temporary. A sheep in a girl’s dream indicates good luck. White chess in a girl’s dream indicates marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep for a married womanIf a married woman sees a sheep in a dream This means that she is spending money on the house. If he sees that he is receiving a white sheep from a dead person, this indicates that there is a dead person in the family who wants charity. Seeing white or black sheep in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that she will get. If he takes a sheep in a dream from If a pregnant woman sees a large number of sheep, this is an indication of the number of days remaining for the birth. Seeing a small sheep could be A large sign is a sign of healthy newborns without diseases. A sheep in a pregnant woman’s dream can indicate a stable married life. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep according to Nabulsi. Seeing a small sheep in a dream is a sign of an obedient and kind boy. A sheep may indicate in a dream a bright future full of positivity. A black sheep is evidence of The huge diet that the dreamer will follow. The white sheep means that you hear the good news.
